sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Tracker: React.FC = () => { const [steps, setSteps] = useState(0); const [calories, setCalories] = useState(0); const [water, setWater] = useState(0); // in liters const [workout, setWorkout] = useState(0); // in minutes return (

Fitness Tracker

Total Steps: {steps}

Total Calories: {calories}

Water Intake: {water} L

Workout Time: {workout} min

); }; export default Tracker;
